header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Relationships in the family and step family, mothering, Christmas, genetics and hormones, e.g. six fingers, ANON and autism test, parenting,
header.activity: Chat in the house with mother and daughter about families and step families.

speaker.occupation: not currently working, caring for toddler
